item.description: Since the founding of America, singers, songwriters and performers have been a powerful force for social justice. On September 28-30, 2012, Americans United is sponsoring a country-wide weekend of musical events to celebrate – and defend – the vital principle of church-state separation. There will be house or club concerts in every state and major concerts in different cities.

group.name: Atheist Humanist Society of CT and RI

item.name: September 30, 2012 | at The Complex Performing Arts Center Lara Herscovitch
